column4: hello, i just installed Ubuntu via Wubi, when i start Ubuntu; it says no root file specified, i clicked OK, time after time nothing appeared to be happening, so i rebooted again, to ask for help here, so can someone assist me please?
It said no root file specified... please PLEASE please i am patient but i have been waiting for 3 days i am desparate i really want to test out Ubuntu but it's not werking
can some one please help  me
we know mate we have all been there and patience is a virtue... 3 days is nothing :)
